data.title: Little Greene Purple Brown 8
data.meta_description: Little Greene Purple Brown 8. Lowest Prices Online. New Grip Technology no primers required. Order Now. Free Next Day Delivery. Free Colour Cards.
data.text:
Little Greene Purple Brown 8. A moody lightfast colour used extensively outdoors and on window sashes.

Available in all Little Greene Paints, in collaboration with the National Trust, authentic historic designs have been coordinated with Little Green Paint and Paper to create impressive and unique interior designs for the 21st Century.

Little Greene colours are available in an extensive range of decorative finishes. Intelligent Paints are easy clean finishes, awarded best Washable Paint by Which Magazine. Enhanced with new Grip Technology no primers are required, a single product solution on walls, woodwork, metal radiators and plastics. The range includes Intelligent Matt (2%), Satin (30%), Eggshell (15%) and Gloss (90%.) Washable emulsions ideal for use in Kitchens, Restaurants, Bathrooms , Hallways and other busy rooms in your home. For exterior woodwork Intelligent Exterior Eggshell is recommended and Intelligent Masonry for exterior walls.

Absolute Matt produces a classic beautiful chalky matt finish (3%) in rich colours. A Child Safe paint ideal for bedrooms, nurseries and reception rooms.

You can read more information on colour selection , recommended products, interior design combinations and our Little Greene Showroom in the West Midlands on our recent article combining colours with Hicks Blue for Bathrooms.

Follow the link to read more about the National Trust . AVACE also manufactures breathable Heritage Paints for lime rendered walls on period homes and cottages if this is of interest go to GCS Exterior Lime Silicate Heritage

Little Greene Purple Brown 8 is available in all our Intelligent and Absolute Finishes.

In collaboration with the National Trust, authentic historic designs have been coordinated with Little Green Paint and Paper to create impressive and unique interior designs for the 21st Century. You can discover more information on colour selection in our interior design blog combining colours with Jack Black.

Little Greene Purple Brown 8 is available in Little Greene Absolute matt finish and all the Little Greene Intelligent paints range:

Absolute Matt Emulsion the most popular Matt Emulsion, a classic 3% dead matt finish beautiful and chalky. Ideal for walls ceilings in bedrooms, dining and receptionrooms. It is a wipeable, quick drying, odourless, Child Safe, Environmentally compliant decorative paint. Available for free delivery in 1lt, 2.5lt and 5lt packs. Colour Sample pots also available, order four sample colours for free delivery.

Intelligent Matt the most hard wearing 2% Matt Finish, 15 times more durable than ordinary matt emulsions. Voted Best Buy by Which. New Grip Technology adheres to most surfaces, no primers required. A quick drying washable finish designed for walls in high traffic areas such as hallways, kitchens, restaurants, entrance halls and open plan living spaces. An odourless, stain resistant, Child Safe, Environmentally compliant decorative paint. Available for free delivery in 1lt, 2.5lt and 5lt packs. Colour Sample pots also available, order four sample colours for free delivery.

Intelligent Masonry is ideal to bring beautiful colour to any exterior brick, stone or rendered wall. Providing 15 years protection in an exterior environment. It inhibits mould and algal growth and is an easy clean washable finish. An exterior durable, quick drying masonry paint available in most Little Greene colours in a 5% dead matt finish. An odourless Environmentally compliant decorative paint available for free delivery in 5lt packs. Colour Sample pots also available, order four sample colours for free delivery.

Intelligent Satin an ultra tough low maintenance 30-35% satin washable easy clean finish. Suitable for all interior joinery in particular kitchen cabinets, skirting, doors, windows and wooden furniture. Utilising new Grip Technologyadheres to most surfaces no additional primers are required. May be used externally. Available for free delivery in 1lt and 2.5lt packs.

Intelligent Eggshell a hard wearing low sheen 10-15%, elegant finish which is easy to apply. A quick drying washable finish designed for walls in the splash zone and interior woodwork including kitchen cupboards and doors. An odourless, stain resistant, Child Safe, Environmentally compliant decorative paint. Utilising new Grip Technology it adheres to most surfaces no additional primers are required. Available for free delivery in 1lt and 2.5lt packs.

Intelligent Exterior Eggshell a quick drying primer finish for all exterior joinery. A low sheen 10-15% finish, weather resistant and completely washable, it inhibits mould and algal growth. Utilising new Grip Technology adheres to most surfaces no additional primers are required. Available for free delivery in 1lt and 2.5lt packs.

Intelligent ASP is an All Surface Primer with excellent adhesion to metal, UPVC, wood and building plastics. Available in a 6% matt finish in the full range of Little Greene colours to compliment your final topcoat colour. Available for free delivery in 1lt and 2.5lt packs.

Intelligent Floor Paint is a superb choice for wooden or concrete floors requiring a high design finish coordinated to your walls ceilings. A hard wearing, quick drying washable finish with low odour. No additional primers are required. Available in a 35% mid-sheen finish, easy to apply by brush or roller. Available for free day delivery in 1lt, and 2.5lt packs.

Toms Oil Eggshell is a weather resistant exterior durable 15% low sheen finish which is easy to apply on primed exterior woodwork, garden furniture and metalwork. A natural oil based exterior durable and washable finish. Available for free delivery in 1lt and 2.5lt packs in all Little Greene Colours including Little Greene Purple Brown 8.

Little Greene Purple Brown 8 is also available in Interior Oil Eggshell a traditional oil based finish with a soft elegant 20% sheen suitable on interior woodwork and primed metals such as radiators and pipework. A durable and washable finish available for free delivery in 1lt and 2.5lt packs.

Visit our Colour Consultancy Showroom at Brierley Hill to guide you through the best colour combinations, finishes and wallpapers to bring beauty and personality to your home. Our advisors will help you select your colours and patterns in our showroom and we will make your Little Greene Paint while you wait or order online for free delivery to your home or collection in store.
